mapper.update: INSERT INTO adin_portfolio (email, portfolio_title, portfolio_ad_detail_category, portfolio_ad_category, portfolio_region, create_dt, modify_dt) VALUES (#{email}, #{portfolioTitle}, #{portfolioAdDetailCategory}, #{portfolioAdCategory}, #{portfolioRegion}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adin_portfolio_img (portfolio_order, email, img_nm, origin_file_nm, img_file_path, create_dt, modify_dt) SELECT (SELECT MAX(portfolio_order) FROM adin_portfolio WHERE email = #{email}), #{email}, #{imgNm}, #{originFileNm}, #{imgFilePath}, NOW(), NOW();
